radiology: Chest X-ray shows bilateral patchy opacities suggestive of early pneumonia.
symptoms_text: Fever, productive cough with yellow sputum, pleuritic chest pain.

radiology: Cardiomegaly with prominent pulmonary vasculature and bilateral pleural effusions.
symptoms_text: Progressive dyspnea on exertion, orthopnea, leg swelling.
Chronic cough, wheezing, exertional dyspnea; former smoker.

ecg: ST elevation in leads II, III, aVF with reciprocal depression in I and aVL.
symptoms_text: Crushing chest pain radiating to left arm, diaphoresis.

radiology: Right upper lobe cavitary lesion with apical scarring.
symptoms_text: Chronic cough, weight loss, low-grade fever, hemoptysis.
